Model

Class Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.Card
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CardGroup1, CardGroup2, CardGroup3, CardGroup4, CardGroup5, CardGroup6

    public abstract class Card
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class that effectively organizes the contents of a Deck object.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Card()
      Empty constructor for a Card object that allows for subclasses to be instantiated as well.

    • Method Detail

      • randomGen

        public int randomGen(int nLo,
                     int nHi)
        Method that generates random numbers within varying ranges for the different subclasses of this class.
        Parameters:
        nLo - Integer defining the minimum number that can be generated.
        nHi - Integer defining the maximum number that can be generated.
        Returns:
        Integer that is within the range nLo-nHi, inclusive.
